column4: does anyone happen to have any experience with connecting a linux pc to a wireless windows network?
i'm on that setup right now
have you had a look at ndiswrapper?
it's a wrapper for windows drivers
is it a usb adapter, or an ethernet adapter?
gimme the model and i'll have a poke around for you :-)
give that a try, if it doesn't work maybe look at the linuxant driverloader
is buying a 10$ eth card an option? :-)
still trying to get the adapter working?
can you put whatever iwconfig and ifconfig returns into http://pastebin.com for me?
if you are able to ping the router but not past it, is something maybe wrong witht he routher?
does iwconfig look similar to what it did before
might be time to ask on the list.  they Know Stuff.
